verses.roman:
śivānandera bhāginā,--śrīkānta-sena nāma
māmāra agocare kahe kari' abhimāna

synonyms: śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; bhāginā—the sister's son; śrīkānta-sena nāma—named Śrīkānta Sena; māmāra—of his maternal uncle; agocare—in the absence of; kahe—said; kari' abhimāna—with an offended state of mind.
translation: Śivānanda Sena's nephew, Śrīkānta, the son of his sister, felt offended, and he commented on the matter when his uncle was absent.
